participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and friendly, Emily enjoys exploring new experiences and connecting with others.
participant_1.background: My first day of safety patrol is a little nerve-wracking, but I'm excited to help keep my school safe. Pudding makes me gassy. I look forward to sharing my opinions with others and starting a new life in Australia. I drive a Subaru Outback because it is roomy for my quilting supplies and my mountain bike. I have an interest in fashion and try to wear nice clothes every day.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Jake prefers quieter activities and values meaningful conversations.
participant_2.background: My worst experience was when I was in a car accident and my family and I were all injured. I like to stay away from big crowds, so Comic Con isn't my thing. I hate the taste of fish. I am really short. I am a happy person.

content.text: Hi how's it going?
I'm doing well. I just finished reading a really good book.
What's it about?
It's about a group of people who go on a road trip together.
Sounds fun. I love road trips. I'm about to start my first day of safety patrol at my school.
Oh, that sounds exciting! What does safety patrol do?
We help keep the school safe and help students get to and from their classes.
That's a great job! I'm sure you'll do a great job.
Thanks! I hope so too.
What are you looking forward to the most about moving to Australia?
I'm looking forward to making new friends and learning about a new culture.
That sounds great! I'm sure you'll have a great time.
Thanks! I hope so too.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to quilt and mountain bike.
Quilting sounds interesting. I've never tried it before.
It's a lot of fun. I love making different patterns and designs.
I can imagine. It sounds like a great way to relax.
It is. I also like to mountain bike. It's a great way to get exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
That sounds like fun too. I've always wanted to try mountain biking.
You should! It's a lot of fun
